text.text: Your fossil cleaner will require water to function. One water bucket will clean 3.5 fossils and water bottles will clean 0.1 fossils.

The fossil cleaner, like all machines, it will also require a redstone input. Redstone torches, redstone, blocks, and other power sources are recomended. However, of course, you'll also need a water source. Either a bucket or water bottle.
Players may find the fossil cleaner a cheeper machine.
